headline: Bank of America Maintains Buy on Synchrony Financial (SYF) Following Partnership Expansion
summary: Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) is one of the 13 High-Quality S&P 500 Financial Stocks According to Hedge Funds. On February 19, 2026, Bank of America Securities analyst Mihir Bhatia maintained a Buy rating on Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF). Prior to this, on February 18, 2026, the company announced the expansion of its partnership with Planet DDS by […]
